org.resthub.web.oauth2

Class OAuth2Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.web.oauth2.OAuth2Token

  • public class OAuth2Token
extends Object
    Response of the token end-point, as described in the Oauth 2 specification (Section 4.2).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String accessToken
      The access token issued by the authorization server.
      protected Integer expiresIn
      The duration in seconds of the access token lifetime.
      protected String refreshToken
      The refresh token used to obtain new access tokens using the same end-user access grant.
      protected String scope
      The scope of the access token as a list of space-delimited strings.

      OAuth2Token()

    • Field Detail

      • accessToken

        protected String accessToken
        The access token issued by the authorization server.

      • expiresIn

        protected Integer expiresIn
        The duration in seconds of the access token lifetime.

      • refreshToken

        protected String refreshToken
        The refresh token used to obtain new access tokens using the same end-user access grant.

      • scope

        protected String scope
        The scope of the access token as a list of space-delimited strings. The value of the "scope" parameter is defined by the authorization server. If the value contains multiple space-delimited strings, their order does not matter, and each string adds an additional access range to the requested scope.
